mapper.select: SELECT M.*,T.PRICE,T.TRADE_LOG_NO,U.PROFILE_IMG FROM MENTO_SERVICE M , TRADE_LOG T ,MEMBER U WHERE M.MENTO_SERVICE_NO = T.SERVICE_NO AND U.MEMBER_ID = M.MENTI_ID AND T.STATE = '처리전' AND M.STATE = 0 AND M.MENTO_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENTO_SERVICE(MENTO_SERVICE_NO, MENTO_ID, MENTI_ID, SERVICE_TERM, START_TM, END_TM, START_DATE, END_DATE, MENTI_INFO) VALUES (MENTO_SERVICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mentoId}, #{mentiId}, #{serviceTerm}, #{startTm}, #{endTm}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{mentiInfo})
